alert.note: Alert for Mahoning (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:51PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mahoning County through 130 PM EDT... At 1251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canfield, or 8 miles northeast of Salem, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Salem, Columbiana, Boardman, Campbell, Canfield, Austintown, Struthers, Poland, New Middletown, Lowellville and Greenford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
